long_description: Lightweight and lumbar-hugging, the Osprey Talon 8 Waistpack is perfect for carrying water and essentials for hiking, mountain biking and trail running. 2 zippered hipbelt pockets and main compartment with internal mesh pocket stow gear. 2 padded pockets securely hold included BPA-free water bottles. Front bungee. Osprey Talon 8 Waistpack features Straight Jacket(TM) horizontal compression straps and side stabilizers that secure water bottles and loads for jostle-free carrying.
short_description: Lightweight and lumbar-hugging, the Osprey Talon 8 Waistpack is perfect for carrying water and essentials for hiking, mountain biking and trail running.
